br.com.caelum.vraptor

Annotation Type Intercepts


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Stereotype
public @interface Intercepts
    Notifies vraptor to use this interceptor in the interceptor stack.
    Interceptors annotated are run in any order, therefore if the sequence is important to your project, use an annotated InterceptorSequence.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends Interceptor>[] after 
      java.lang.Class<? extends Interceptor>[] before 

    • Element Detail

      • before

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Interceptor>[] before
        Default:
        br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.ExecuteMethodInterceptor.class

      • after

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Interceptor>[] after
        Default:
        br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.ResourceLookupInterceptor.class
